item.title: Beogram 4002 (5523): Some Final Touches - Replacing Plinth and Keypad
item.description:
Following the installation of the BeoloverRIAA internal preamplifier and the Commander remote control, this Beogram 4002 (5523) needed a few finishing touches. The original plinth of the Beogram was damaged. A replacement plinth was sourced, but it also had minor damage, particularly to the corners. Inspired by a previous veneer repair on a Beomaster 8000, a similar approach was taken to address the plinth’s corners. Veneer was added and color-matched to the existing finish, significantly improving the appearance, although not completely perfect...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4002-5523-some-final-touches-replacing-plinth-and-keypad/
